attributes.action: Scrap The BBC license fee and disband the BBC
attributes.additional_details: Enough is Enough we the public will no longer fund the BBC
attributes.background: Disband the BBC and scrap the license fee

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Cancel the BBC license fee and shut down the BBC
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641007
